Our Promise

Your Satisfaction Guaranteed or your job will be re-posted FREE of charge

Recruiting in the world is challenging and we are here to support you. If you are not 100% satisfied with Job Board Post services, you may contact our consultants
dialing: 0013944 0568 or writing to jobs@domain.com, to request your FREE of charge re-post (excluding premium service)
within 5 business days after your paid job post has expired.
